ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE data capabilities
2.0-megapixel digital camera with integrated flash also captures video; 20 MB internal memory; expandable via SD/MMC memory cards
Bluetooth for handsfree devices; speakerphone; digital music player; FM radio and support for Visual Radio
Up to 3.5 hours of digital talk time and 265 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia N72 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, MP3/Video Player, SD/MMC--International Version with Warranty (Pink)
